Headline: Sashika Nisansala Wedding Anniversary Shoot
News Content:
ප්‍රකට ගායිකා සෂිකා නිසංසලා සිය විවාහයේ 10 වන සැමරුම වෙනුවෙන් පසුගියදා ඡායාරූප සඳහා පෙනී සිටියේ පහත පරිදිය.

That's her wish and this is their wish. Whether the person is rich or poor all have their choices, their own ways. Like you respect your daughter in law's choice, learn to respect the choice of others.  For these types of weddings of celebrities or popular people, very often beauticians or saloons give the full sponsorship and use it as a marketing strategy.

I am all for helping people out. Personally, I would not spend on an extravagant wedding either. But this is their special day, once in a lifetime (hopefully). As long it's their money, it's their choice. I'm sure your DIL is very nice and has a good heart. They can own nice cars, have nice houses or go on expensive vacations. Their money, their choice.
